summary:
Ever thought to yourself vampires in Skyrim are not like proper vampires?
Well I have fixed all of that with this mod!
descriptionHtml:
Ever thought to yourself vampires in Skyrim are not like proper vampires?
Well I have fixed all of that with this mod!

I have changed the Health, Health Regen, Stamina, Stamina Regen, Magicka, Magicka Regen, Strength, Skill Trees, Motion, Animations of all Vampires.
I have also made every Vampire Race playable.
I have also including playable Elder and Child races.
I have even added in a new Vampire Faction, along with a new Vampire NPC, that you can encounter at Ansilvund.











If you do not want to use this mod, but want to be a extremely powerful vampire, type the following console commands.
player.setav attackdamagemult 5
player.setav speedmult 500
author: Usnex
